events.message: I am reporting an accident that occurred on March 8 involving my vehicle colliding with another car at an intersection.
Your claim has been categorized under Auto Accident based on the details you provided regarding the collision.
An insurance agent has been assigned to your case to assist you through the vehicle accident claim process.
We acknowledge the receipt of your auto accident claim and will proceed with the investigation as soon as possible.
Please submit photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and proof of insurance to continue processing your claim.
The requested documents including damage photos and accident report have been received for your vehicle collision claim.
Our claims investigation team has started reviewing the submitted documents and assessing your auto accident damages.
The investigation into the car collision has been completed; the damages and liability are now fully assessed.
Based on investigation results, a settlement offer has been proposed to cover the vehicle repairs and related expenses.
Customer has responded positively accepting the proposed settlement for the damages following the car accident.
Your vehicle accident claim has been officially approved and we will proceed with issuing the payment shortly.
The settlement payment for your auto accident claim has been issued to your bank account as per your direction.
Your vehicle collision claim is now closed. We hope the claims process met your expectations and thank you for your cooperation.
